GK16andhvy_u:9: kāvyasyātmā dhvanir iti budhair yaḥ samāmnāta-pūrvas tasyābhāvaṃ jagadur apare bhāktam āhus tam anye /
GK16andhvy_u:10: kecid vācām sthitam aviṣaye tattvam ūcus tadīyaṃ tena brūmaḥ sahṛdaya-manaḥ-prītaye tat-svarūpam // DhvK_1.1 //
GK16andhvy_u:11: budhaiḥ kāvya-tattva-vidbhiḥ kāvyasyātmā dhvanir iti saṃjñitaḥ,
GK16andhvy_u:12_0: paramparayā yaḥ samāmnāta-pūrvaḥ samyak āsamantāt mnātaḥ prakaṭitaḥ / tasya sahṛdaya-jana-manaḥ-prakāśamānasyāpy
GK16andhvy_u:12_1: abhāvam anye jagaduḥ / tad-abhāva-vādināṃ cāmī vikalpāḥ sambhavanti /
GK16andhvy_u:13_0: tatra kecid ācakṣīran-śabdārtha-śarīraṃ tāvat kāvyam / tatra ca śabda-gatāś cārutva-hetavo
GK16andhvy_u:13_1: 'nuprāsādayaḥ prasiddhā eva / artha-gatāś copamādayaḥ / varṇa-saṅghaṭanādharmāś ca
GK16andhvy_u:13_2: ye mādhuryādayas te 'pi pratīyante / tad-anatirikta-vṛttayo vṛttayo 'pi yāḥ kaiścid
GK16andhvy_u:14: tā api gatāḥ śravaṇa-gocaram / rītayaś ca vaidarbhī-prabhṛtayaḥ /
GK16andhvy_u:16_0: anye brūyuḥ-nāsty eva dhvaniḥ / prasiddha-prasthāna-vyatirekiṇaḥ kāvya-prakārasya
GK16andhvy_u:16_1: kāvyatva-hāneḥ sahṛdaya-hṛdayāhlādi-śabdārtha-mayatvam eva kāvya-lakṣaṇam / na cokta-prasthānātirekiṇo
GK16andhvy_u:16_2: mārgasya tat sambhavati / na ca tat-samatāntaḥ-pātinaḥ sahṛdayān kāṃścit parikalpya
GK16andhvy_u:16_3: tat-prasiddhyā dhvanau kāvya-vyapadeśaḥ pravartito 'pi sakala-vidvan-mano-grāhitām avalambate /
GK16andhvy_u:17: punar apare tasyābhāvam anyathā kathayeyuḥ-na sambhavaty eva dhvanir nāmāpūrvaḥ kaścit / kāmanīyakam anati-vartamānasya tasyokteṣv eva cārutva-hetuṣv antar-bhāvāt /
GK16andhvy_u:18: teṣām anyatamasyaiva vā apūrva-samākhyā-mātra-karaṇe yat kiṃcana kathanaṃ syāt /
GK16andhvy_u:19_0: kiṃ ca vāg-vikalpānām ānantyāt sambhavaty api vā kasmiṃścit kāvya-lakṣaṇa-vidhāyibhiḥ
GK16andhvy_u:19_1: prasiddhair apradarśite prakāra-leśe dhvanir dhvanir iti yad etad alīka-sahṛdayatva-bhāvanā-mukulita-locanair nṛtyate,
GK16andhvy_u:20_0: tatra hetuṃ na vidmaḥ / sahasraśo hi mahātmabhir anyair alaṅkāra-prakārāḥ prakāśitāḥ
GK16andhvy_u:20_1: prakāśyante ca / na ca teṣām eṣā daśā śrūyate / tasmāt pravāda-mātraṃ dhvaniḥ / na
GK16andhvy_u:20_2: tv asya kṣoda-kṣamam tattvam kiṃcid api prakāśayituṃ śakyam /
GK16andhvy_u:22: yasminn asti na vastu kiṃcana manaḥ-prahlādi sālaṃkṛti
GK16andhvy_u:23: vyutpannai racitaṃ ca naiva vacanair vakrokti-śūnyaṃ ca yat /
GK16andhvy_u:24: kāvyaṃ tad-dhvaninā samanvitam iti prītyā praśaṃsañ jaḍo
GK16andhvy_u:25: no vidmo 'bhidadhāti kiṃ sumatinā pṛṣṭaḥ svarūpaṃ dhvaneḥ //
GK16andhvy_u:26_0: bhāktam āhus tam anye / anye taṃ dhvani-saṃjñitam kāvyātmānaṃ guṇa-vṛttir ity āhuḥ /
GK16andhvy_u:26_1: yady api ca dhvani-śabda-saṃkīrtanena kāvya-lakṣaṇa-vidhāyibhir guṇa-vṛttir anyo
GK16andhvy_u:27: tathāpi amukhya-vṛttyā kāvyeṣu vyavahāraṃ darśayatā dhvani-mārgo manāk spṛṣṭo 'pi na lakṣita iti parikalpyaivam uktam-“bhāktam āhus tam anye” iti /
GK16andhvy_u:28_0: kecit punar lakṣaṇa-karaṇa-śālīna-buddhayo dhvanes tattvaṃ girām agocaram sahṛdaya-hṛdaya-saṃvedyam
GK16andhvy_u:28_1: eva samākhyātavantaḥ / tenaivaṃ-vidhāsu vimatiṣu sthitāsu sahṛdaya-manaḥ-prītaye
GK16andhvy_u:29: tasya hi dhvaneḥ svarūpaṃ sakala-sat-kavi-kāvyopaniṣad-bhūtam atiramaṇīyam aṇīyasībhir api cirantana-kāvya-lakṣaṇa-vidhāyināṃ buddhibhir anunmīlita-pūrvam,
GK16andhvy_u:30: atha ca rāmāyaṇa-mahābhārata-prabhṛtini lakṣye sarvatra prasiddha-vyavahāraṃ lakṣayatāṃ sahṛdayānām ānando manasi labhatāṃ pratiṣṭhām iti prakāśyate || DhvA_1.1 ||
GK16andhvy_u:31: tatra dhvaner eva lakṣayitum ārabdhasya bhūmikāṃ racayitum idam ucyate-
GK16andhvy_u:35: vācya-pratīyamānākhyau tasya bhedāv ubhau smṛtau // DhvK_1.2 //
GK16andhvy_u:36: kāvyasya hi lalitocita-sanniveśa-cāruṇaḥ śarīrasyevātmā sāra-rūpatayā sthitaḥ sahṛdaya-ślāghyo yo 'rthas tasya vācyaḥ pratīyamānaś ceti dvau bhedau /
GK16andhvy_u:39: tatra vācyaḥ prasiddho yaḥ prakārair upamādibhiḥ /
GK16andhvy_u:41: tato neha pratanyate kevalam anūdyate punar yathopayogam iti || DhvA_1.3 ||
GK16andhvy_u:44: pratīyamānaṃ punar anyad eva vastv asti vāṇīṣu mahā-kavīnām /
GK16andhvy_u:45: yat tat prasiddhāvayavātiriktaṃ vibhāti lāvaṇyam ivāṅganāsu // DhvK_1.4 //
GK16andhvy_u:46_0: pratīyamānaṃ punar anyad eva vācyād vastv asti vāṇīṣu mahā-kavīnām / yat tat sahṛdaya-suprasiddhaṃ
GK16andhvy_u:46_1: prasiddhebhyo 'laṅkṛtebhyaḥ pratītebhyo vāvayavebhyo vyatiriktatvena prakāśate lāvaṇyam
GK16andhvy_u:46_2: ivāṅganāsu / yathā hy aṅganāsu lāvaṇyaṃ pṛthaṅ-nirvarṇyamānaṃ nikhilāvayava-vyatireki
GK16andhvy_u:46_3: kim apy anyad eva sahṛdaya-locanāmṛtaṃ tattvāntaraṃ tadvad eva so 'rthaḥ / sa hy
GK16andhvy_u:46_4: artho vācya-sāmarthyākṣiptam vastu-mātram alaṅkāra-rasādayaś cety aneka prabheda-prabhinnau
GK16andhvy_u:46_5: darśayiṣyate / sarveṣu ca teṣu prakāreṣu tasya vācyād anyatvam / tathā hy ādyas tāvat
GK16andhvy_u:46_6: prabhedo vācyād dūram vibhedavān / sa hi kadācid vācye vidhi-rūpe pratiṣedha-rūpaḥ / yathā-
GK16andhvy_u:47: bhama dhammia vīsattho so suṇao ajja mārio deṇa /
GK16andhvy_u:50: [bhrama dhārmika visrabdhaḥ sa śunako 'dya māritas tena /
GK16andhvy_u:53: attā ettha ṇimajjai ettha ahaṃ diasaaṃ paloehi /
GK16andhvy_u:54: mā pahia rattiandhia sejjāe maha ṇimajjahisi //[*4]
GK16andhvy_u:56: (śvaśrūr atra nimajjati, atrāhaṃ divasa eva pralokaya /
GK16andhvy_u:57: mā pathika rātryandha śayyāyāṃ mama nimaṅkṣyasi //)
GK16andhvy_u:59: vacca maha bbia ekkei hontu ṇīsāsaroiabbāiṃ /
GK16andhvy_u:60: mā tujja bi tīa biṇā dakkhiṇa-haassa jāantu //[*5]
GK16andhvy_u:63: mā tavāpi tayā vinā dākṣiṇya-hatasya janiṣata //]
GK16andhvy_u:66: ahisāriāṇaṃ vigghaṃ karosi aṇṇāṇaṃ bi haāse //[*6]
GK16andhvy_u:69: abhisārikāṇāṃ vighnaṃ karoṣy anyāsām api hatāśe //]
GK16andhvy_u:71: kassa ba ṇa hoi roso daṭṭhūṇa piyāe sa-bbaṇaṃ aharaṃ /
GK16andhvy_u:74: [kasya vā na bhavati roṣo dṛṣṭvā priyāyāḥ sa-vraṇam adharam /
GK16andhvy_u:76: anye caivaṃ-prakārā vācyād vibhedinaḥ pratīyamāna-bhedāḥ saṃbhavanti / teṣāṃ diṅ-mātram etat pradarśitam /
GK16andhvy_u:77: dvitīyo 'pi prabhedo vācyād vibhinnaḥ sa-prapañcam agre darśayiṣyate /
GK16andhvy_u:78: tṛtīyas tu rasādi-lakṣaṇaḥ prabhedo vācya-sāmarthyākṣiptaḥ prakāśate,
GK16andhvy_u:79_0: na tu sākṣāc-chabda-vyāpāra-viṣaya iti vācyād vibhinna eva / tathā hi vācyatvaṃ tasya
GK16andhvy_u:79_1: sva-śabda-niveditatvena vā syāt / vibhāvādi-pratipādana-mukhena vā / purvasmin pakṣe
GK16andhvy_u:79_2: sva-śabda-niveditatvābhāve rasādīnām apratīti-prasaṅgaḥ / na ca sarvatra teṣāṃ sva-śabda-niveditatvam / yatrāpy asti tat,
GK16andhvy_u:82_0: na tu tatkṛtā viṣayāntare tathā tasyā adarśanāt / na hi kevala-śṛṅgārādi-śabda-mātra-bhāji
GK16andhvy_u:82_1: vibhāvādi-pratipādana-rahite kāvye manāg api rasavattva-pratītir asti / yataś ca
GK16andhvy_u:82_2: svābhidhānam antareṇa kevalebhyo 'pi vibhāvādibhyo viśiśṭebhyo rasādīnāṃ pratītiḥ /
GK16andhvy_u:82_3: kevalāc ca svābhidhānād apratītiḥ / tasmād anvaya-vyatirekābhyām abhidheya-sāmarthyākṣiptatvam
GK16andhvy_u:82_4: eva rasādīnām / na tv abhidheyatvaṃ kathaṃcit,
GK16andhvy_u:83: iti tṛtīyo 'pi prabhedo vācyād vibhinna eveti sthitam / vācyena tv asya saheva pratītir ity agre darśayiṣyate || DhvA_1.4 ||
GK16andhvy_u:86: kāvyasyātmā sa evārthas tathā cādikaveḥ purā /
GK16andhvy_u:89_1: pariṇataḥ / śoko hi karuṇa-sthāyi-bhāvaḥ / pratīyamānasya cānya-bheda-darśane 'pi
GK16andhvy_u:92: sarasvatī svādu tad-artha-vastu niḥṣyandamānā mahatāṃ kavīnām /
GK16andhvy_u:94_0: tat vastu-tattvaṃ niḥṣyandamānā mahatāṃ kavīnāṃ bhāratī aloka-sāmānyaṃ pratibhā-viśeṣaṃ
GK16andhvy_u:94_2: kālidāsa-prabhṛtayo dvitrāḥ pañcaṣā vā mahā-kavaya iti gaṇyante || DhvA_1.6 ||
GK16andhvy_u:99: vedyate sa tu kāvyārtha-tattvajñair eva kevalam // DhvK_1.7 //
GK16andhvy_u:100_0: so 'rtho yasmāt kevalaṃ kāvyārtha-tattva-jñair eva jñāyate / yadi ca vācya-rūpa evāsāv
GK16andhvy_u:100_1: arthaḥ syāt tad-vācya-vācaka-rūpa-parijñānād eva tat-pratītiḥ syāt / atha ca vācya-vācaka-lakṣaṇa-mātra-kṛta-śramāṇāṃ
GK16andhvy_u:101: evaṃ vācya-vyatirekiṇo vyaṅgyasya sad-bhāvaṃ pratipādya prādhānyaṃ tasyaiveti darśayati-
GK16andhvy_u:105: yatnataḥ pratyabhijñeyau tau śabdārthau mahākaveḥ // DhvK_1.8 //
GK16andhvy_u:107: na śabda-mātram / tāv eva śabdārthau mahākaveḥ pratyabhijñeyau /vyaṅgya-vyañjakābhyām eva suprayuktābhyāṃ mahākavitva-lābho mahā-kavīnāṃ,
GK16andhvy_u:109: idānīṃ vyaṅgya-vyañjakayoḥ prādhānye 'pi yad-vācya-vācakāv eva prathamam upādadate kavayas tad api yuktam evetyāha-
GK16andhvy_u:113: tad-upāyatayā tadvad arthe vācye tad-ādṛtaḥ // DhvK_1.9 //
GK16andhvy_u:114_0: yathā hy ālokārthī sann api dīpa-śikhāyāṃ yatnavāñ jano bhavati tad-upāyatayā / na
GK16andhvy_u:114_1: hi dīpa-śikhām antareṇālokaḥ sambhavati / tad vyaṅgyam arthaṃ pratyādṛto jano vācye
GK16andhvy_u:114_2: 'rthe yatnavān bhavati / anena pratipādakasya kaver vyaṅgyam arthaṃ prati vyāpāro
GK16andhvy_u:120: yathā hi padārtha-dvāreṇa vākyārthāvagamas tathā vācyārtha-pratīti-pūrvikā vyaṅgyasyārthasya pratipattiḥ || DhvA_1.10 ||
GK16andhvy_u:121: idānīṃ vācyārtha-pratīti-pūrvakatve 'pi tat-pratīter vyaṅgyasyārthasya prādhānyaṃ yathā na vyālupyate tathā darśayati-
GK16andhvy_u:125: yathā vyāpāra-niṣpattau padārtho na vibhāvyate // DhvK_1.11 //
GK16andhvy_u:126: yathā sva-sāmarthya-vaśenaiva vākyārthaṃ prakāśayann api padārtho vyāpāra-niṣpattau na bhāvyate vibhaktatayā || DhvA_1.11 ||
GK16andhvy_u:131: evaṃ vācya-vyatirekiṇo vyaṅgyasyārthasya sad-bhāvaṃ pratipādya prakṛta upayojayann āha-
GK16andhvy_u:134: yatrārthaḥ śabdo vā tam artham upasarjanīkṛta-svārthau /
GK16andhvy_u:135: vyaṅktaḥ kāvya-viśeṣaḥ sa dhvanir iti sūribhiḥ kathitaḥ // DhvK_1.13 //
GK16andhvy_u:136: yatrārtho vācya-viśeṣaḥ vācaka-viśeṣaḥ śabdo vā tam arthaṃ vyaṅktaḥ,
GK16andhvy_u:137: sa kāvya-viśeṣo dhvanir iti / anena vācya-vācaka-cārutva-hetubhya upamādibhyo 'nuprāsādibhyaś ca vibhakta eva dhvaner viṣaya iti darśitam /
GK16andhvy_u:138: yad apy uktam-“prasiddha-prasthānātikramiṇo mārgasya kāvya-hāner dhvanir nāsti” iti,
GK16andhvy_u:139: tad apy ayuktam / yato lakṣaṇa-kṛtām eva sa kevalaṃ na prasiddhaḥ,
GK16andhvy_u:140: lakṣye tu parīkṣyamāṇe sa eva sahṛdaya-hṛdayāhlāda-kāri kāvya-tattvam / tato 'nyac citram evety agre darśayiṣyāmaḥ /
GK16andhvy_u:141: yad apy uktam-“kāmanīyakam anativartamānasya tasyoktālaṅkārādi-prakāreṣv antar-bhāvaḥ” iti,
GK16andhvy_u:143: vācya-vācaka-mātrāśrayiṇi prasthāne vyaṅgya-vyañjaka-samāśrayeṇa vyavasthitasya dhvaneḥ katham antar-bhāvaḥ,
GK16andhvy_u:149: nanu yatra pratīyamānasyārthasya vaiśadyenāpratītiḥ sa nāma mā bhūd dhvaner viṣayaḥ / yatra tu pratītir asti,
GK16andhvy_u:151: tatra dhvaner antar-bhāvo bhaviṣyatīty ādi nirākartum abhihitam-“upasarjanī-kṛta-svārthau” iti /
GK16andhvy_u:153: guṇīkṛtābhidheyaḥ śabdo vā yatrārthāntaram abhivyanakti sa dhvanir iti / teṣu kathaṃ tasyāntar-bhāvaḥ / vyaṅgya-prādhānye hi dhvaniḥ / na caitat samāsoktyādiṣv asti /
GK16andhvy_u:159: ity ādau vyaṅgyenānugataṃ vācyam eva prādhānyena pratīyate samāropita-nāyikā-nāyaka-vyavahārayor niśā-śaśinor eva vākyārthatvāt /
GK16andhvy_u:160_0: ākṣepe 'pi vyaṅgya-viśeṣākṣepiṇo 'pi vācyasyaiva cārutvaṃ prādhānyena vākyārtha ākṣepokti-sāmarthyād
GK16andhvy_u:160_1: eva jñāyate / tathā hi-tatra śabdopārūḍho viśeṣābhidhānecchayā pratiṣedha-rūpo ya
GK16andhvy_u:160_2: ākṣepaḥ sa eva vyaṅgya-viśeṣam ākṣipan mukhyaṃ kāvya-śarīram /
GK16andhvy_u:163: aho daiva-gatiḥ kīdṛk tathāpi na samāgamaḥ //
GK16andhvy_u:164: atra satyām api vyaṅgya-pratītau vācyasyaiva cārutvam utkarṣavad iti tasyaiva prādhānya-vivakṣā /
GK16andhvy_u:165: yathā ca dīpakāpahnuty-ādau vyaṅgyatvenopamāyāḥ pratītāv api prādhānyenāvivakṣitatvān na tayā vyapadeśas tadvad atrāpi draṣṭavyam / anukta-nimittāyām api viśeṣoktau-
GK16andhvy_u:166: āhūto 'pi sahāyair om ity uktvā vimukta-nidro 'pi /
GK16andhvy_u:167: gantu-manā api pathikaḥ saṅkocaṃ naiva śithilayati //
GK16andhvy_u:168_0: ity ādau vyaṅgyasya prakaraṇa-sāmarthyāt pratīti-mātraṃ na tu tat-pratīti-nimittā
GK16andhvy_u:168_1: kācic cārutva-niṣpattir iti na prādhānyam / paryāyokte 'pi yadi prādhānyena vyaṅgyatvaṃ
GK16andhvy_u:168_2: tad bhavatu nāma tasya dhvanāv antar-bhāvaḥ / na tu dhvanes tatrāntar-bhāvaḥ / tasya
GK16andhvy_u:168_3: mahā-viṣayatvenāṅgitvena ca pratipādayiṣyamāṇatvāt / na punaḥ paryāyo bhāmahodāhṛta-sadṛśe
GK16andhvy_u:169: apahnuti-dīpakayoḥ punar-vācyasya prādhānyaṃ vyaṅgyasya cānuyāyitvaṃ prasiddham eva /
GK16andhvy_u:171_0: tadā vyaṅgyasya prādhānyenāvivakṣitatvān na dhvani-viṣayatvam / alaṅkāra-dvaya-sambhāvanāyāṃ
GK16andhvy_u:171_1: tu vācya-vyaṅgyayoḥ samaṃ prādhānyam / atha vācyopasarjanī-bhāvena vyaṅgyasya tatrāvasthānaṃ
GK16andhvy_u:172: na tu sa eva dhvanir iti vaktuṃ śakyam / paryāyokta-nirdiṣṭa-nyāyāt / api ca saṅkarālaṅkāre 'pi ca kvacit saṅkaroktir eva dhvani-sambhāvanāṃ nirākaroti /
GK16andhvy_u:173_0: aprastuta-praśaṃsāyām api yadā sāmānya-viśeṣa-bhāvān nimitta-nimitti-bhāvād vā abhidhīyamānasyāprastutasya
GK16andhvy_u:173_1: pratīyamānena prastutenābhisambandhas tadābhidhīyamāna-pratīyamānayoḥ samam eva prādhānyam /
GK16andhvy_u:173_2: yadā tāvat sāmānyasyāprastutasyābhidhīyamānasya prākaraṇikena viśeṣeṇa pratīyamānena
GK16andhvy_u:173_3: sambandhas tadā viśeṣa-pratītau satyām api prādhānyena tat-sāmānyenāvinābhāvāt sāmānyasyāpi

GK16andhvy_u:497_2: vyatirekasyātma-lābha iti nāyaṃ saṃsṛṣṭer viṣaya iti cet-na ;
GK16andhvy_u:500: gāḍhodgīrṇojjvala-śrīr ahani na rahitā no tamaḥ-kajjalena /

GK16andhvy_u:519: hantaika-sthaṃ kvacid api na te bhīru sādṛśyam asti //ity ādau /

GK16andhvy_u:579: sarvaika-śaraṇam akṣayam adhīśam īśaṃ dhiyāṃ hariṃ kṛṣṇam /

GK16andhvy_u:582: khaṃ ye 'tyujjvalayanti lūna-tamaso ye vā nakhodbhāsino
GK16andhvy_u:583: ye puṣṇanti saroruha-śriyam api kṣiptābja-bhāsaś ca ye /

GK16andhvy_u:586: evam anye 'pi śabda-śakti-mūlānusvāna-rūpa-vyaṅgya-dhvani-prakārāḥ santi te sahṛdayaiḥ svayam anusartavyāḥ / iha tu grantha-vistara-bhayān na tat-prapañcaḥ kṛtaḥ /
GK16andhvy_u:589: artha-śakty-udbhavas tv anyo yatrārthaḥ sa prakāśate /

GK16andhvy_u:591: yatrārthaḥ sva-sāmarthyād arthāntaram abhivyanakti śabda-vyāpāraṃ vinaiva so 'rtha-śakty-udbhavo nāmānusvānopama-vyaṅgyo dhvaniḥ /
GK16andhvy_u:593: evaṃ vādini devarṣau pārśve pitur adhomukhī /
GK16andhvy_u:595_0: atra hi līlā-kamala-patra-gaṇanam upasarjanīkṛta-svarūpaṃ śabda-vyāpāraṃ vinaivārthāntaraṃ
GK16andhvy_u:595_1: vyabhicāri-bhāva-lakṣaṇaṃ prakāśayati / na cāyam alakṣya-krama-vyaṅgyasyaiva dhvaner
GK16andhvy_u:595_2: viṣayaḥ / yato yatra sākṣac-chabda-niveditebhyo vibhāvānubhāva-vyabhicāribhyo rasādīnāṃ pratītiḥ,
GK16andhvy_u:596_0: sa tasya kevalasya mārgaḥ / yathā kumāra-sambhave madhu-prasaṅge vasanta-puṣpābharaṇaṃ
GK16andhvy_u:596_1: vahantyā devyā āgamanādi-varṇanaṃ manobhava-śara-sandhāna-paryantaṃ śambhoś ca parivṛtta-dhairyasya
GK16andhvy_u:596_2: ceṣṭā-viśeṣa-varṇanādi sākṣac-chabda-niveditam / tasmād ayam anyo dhvaneḥ prakāraḥ /
GK16andhvy_u:597: yatra ca śabda-vyāpāra-sahāyo 'rtho 'rthāntarasya vyañjakatvenopādīyate sa nāsya dhvaner viṣayaḥ / yathā-
GK16andhvy_u:600: atra līlā-kamala-nimīlanasya vyañjakatvam uktyaiva niveditam || DhvA_2.22 ||
GK16andhvy_u:606: śabda-śaktyārtha-śaktyā śabdārtha-śaktyā vākṣipto 'pi vyaṅgyo 'rthaḥ kavinā punaryatra svoktyā prakāśī-kriyate so 'smād anusvānopama-vyaṅgyād dhvaner anya evālaṅkāraḥ /
GK16andhvy_u:607: alakṣya-krama-vyaṅgyasya vā dhvaneḥ sati sambhave sa tādṛg anyo 'laṅkāraḥ /
GK16andhvy_u:609: vatse mā gā viṣādaṃ śvasanam urujavaṃ santyajordhva-pravṛttaṃ
GK16andhvy_u:610: kampaḥ ko vā gurus te bhavatu balabhidā jṛmbhitenātra yāhi /
GK16andhvy_u:612: yasmai lakṣmī-madād vaḥ sa dahatu duritaṃ mantha-mūḍhāṃ payodhiḥ //

GK16andhvy_u:890: yathā-“smara-nava-nadī-pūreṇoḍhāḥ” ity ādi-ślokaḥ / atra hi rūpakeṇa yathokta-vyañjaka-lakṣaṇānugatena prasādhito rasaḥ sutarām abhivyajyate || DhvA_3.3-4 ||
GK16andhvy_u:892: alakṣya-krama-vyaṅgyaḥ saṅghaṭanāyāṃ bhāsate dhvanir ity uktaṃ tatra saṅghaṭanā-svarūpam eva tāvan nirūpyate-
GK16andhvy_u:901: guṇān āśritya tiṣṭhantī mādhuryādīn vyanakti sā /
GK16andhvy_u:903: sā saṅghaṭanā rasādīn vyanakti guṇānāśritya tiṣṭhantīti / atra ca vikalpyam guṇānāṃ saṅghaṭanāyāścaikyaṃ vyatireko vā / vyatireke 'pi dvayī gatiḥ / guṇāśrayā saṅghaṭanā,
GK16andhvy_u:904_0: saṅghaṭanāśrayā vā guṇā iti / tatraikya-pakṣe saṅghaṭanāśraya-guṇa-pakṣe ca guṇānātma-bhūtānādheya-bhūtān
GK16andhvy_u:904_1: vāśritya tiṣṭhantī saṅghaṭanā rasādīn vyanaktīty ayam arthaḥ / yadā tu nānātva-pakṣe
GK16andhvy_u:904_2: guṇāśraya-saṅghaṭanā-pakṣaḥ tadā guṇān āśritya tiṣṭhantī guṇa-paratantra-svabhāvā
GK16andhvy_u:904_3: na tu guṇa-rūpaivety arthaḥ / kiṃ punar evaṃ vikalpanasya prayojanam iti ?
GK16andhvy_u:905: abhidhīyate-yadi guṇāḥ saṅghaṭanā cetyekaṃ tattvaṃ saṅghaṭanāśrayā vā guṇāḥ,
GK16andhvy_u:906: tadā saṅghaṭanāyā iva guṇānām aniyata-viṣayatva-prasaṅgaḥ / guṇānāṃ hi mādhurya-prasāda-prakarṣaḥ karuṇa-vipralambha-śṛṅgāra-viṣaya eva / raudrādbhutādi-viṣayam ojaḥ /
GK16andhvy_u:908: saṅghaṭanāyās tu sa vighaṭate / tathā hi śṛṅgāre 'pi dīrgha-samāsā dṛśyate raudrādiṣv asamāsā ceti /
GK16andhvy_u:909: tatra śṛṅgāre dīrgha-samāsā yathā-“mandāra-kusuma-reṇu-piñjaritālakā” iti / yathā vā-
GK16andhvy_u:913: vadanam idaṃ kaṃ na tāpayati //ity ādau /
GK16andhvy_u:914: tathā raudrādiṣv apy asamāsā dṛśyate / yathā-“yo yaḥ śastraṃ bibharti sva-bhuja-guru-madaḥ” ity ādau / tasmān na saṅghaṭanā-svarūpāḥ,
GK16andhvy_u:916: nanu yadi saṅghaṭanā guṇānāṃ nāśrayas tat kim-ālambanā ete parikalpyantām ?
GK16andhvy_u:918: tam artham avalambante ye 'ṅginaṃ te guṇāḥ smṛtāḥ /
GK16andhvy_u:921_2: eva / śabda-dharmatvaṃ caiṣām anyāśrayatve 'pi śarīrāśrayatvam iva śauryādīnām /
GK16andhvy_u:922: nanu yadi śabdāśrayā guṇās tat-saṅghaṭanā-rūpatvaṃ tad-āśrayatvaṃ vā teṣāṃ prāptam eva /
GK16andhvy_u:923: na hy asaṅghaṭitāḥ śabdā artha-viśeṣa-pratipādya-rasādy-āśritānāṃ guṇānām avācakatvād āśrayā bhavanti / naivam / varṇa-pada-vyaṅgyatvasya rasādīnāṃ pratipāditatvāt /
GK16andhvy_u:924: abhyupagate vā vākya-vyaṅgyatve rasādīnāṃ na niyatā kācit saṅghaṭanā teṣām āśrayatvaṃ pratipadyata ity aniyata-saṅghaṭanāḥ śabdā eva guṇānāṃ vyaṅgya-viśeṣānugatā āśrayāḥ /
GK16andhvy_u:926: mādhurye yadi nāmaivam ucyate tad ucyatām ; ojasaḥ punaḥ katham aniyata-saṅghaṭana-śabdāśrayatvam ?
GK16andhvy_u:927: na hy asamāsā saṅghaṭanā kadācid ojasa āśrayatāṃ pratipadyate / ucyate-yadi na prasiddhi-mātra-graha-dūṣitaṃ cetas tad atrāpi na na brūmaḥ /
GK16andhvy_u:929: yato raudrādīn hi prakāśayataḥ kāvyasya dīptir oja iti prāk pratipāditam / tac caujo yady asamāsāyām api saṅghaṭanāyāṃ syāt tat ko doṣo bhavet ?
GK16andhvy_u:930_0: na cācārutvaṃ sahṛdaya-hṛdaya-saṃvedyam asti / tasmād aniyata-saṅghaṭana-śabdāśrayatve
GK16andhvy_u:930_1: guṇānāṃ na kācit kṣatiḥ / teṣāṃ tu cakṣur-ādīnām iva yathāsvaṃ viṣaya-niyamitasya
GK16andhvy_u:931_0: yat tūktam-“saṅghaṭanāvad guṇānām apy aniyata-viṣayatvaṃ prāpnoti / lakṣye vyabhicāradarśanāt”
GK16andhvy_u:931_1: iti / tatrāpy etad ucyate-yatra lakṣye parikalpita-viṣaya-vyabhicāras tad virūpam
GK16andhvy_u:931_2: evāstu / katham acārutvaṃ tādṛśe viṣaye sahṛdayānāṃ nāvabhātīti cet ?
GK16andhvy_u:933_0: dvividho hi doṣaḥ-kaver avyutpatti-kṛto 'śakti-kṛtaś ca / tatrāvyutpatti-kṛto doṣaḥ
GK16andhvy_u:933_1: śakti-tiraskṛtatvāt kadācin na lakṣyate / yas tv aśakti-kṛto doṣaḥ sa jhaṭiti pratīyate /
GK16andhvy_u:935: yas tv aśakti-kṛtas tasya sa jhaṭity avabhāsate //
GK16andhvy_u:936_1: śakti-tiraskṛtatvāt grāmyatvena na pratibhāsate / yathā kumāra-sambhave devī-sambhoga-varṇanam /
GK16andhvy_u:936_2: evam ādau ca viṣaye yathaucitya-tyāgas tathā darśitam evāgre / śakti-kṛtatvaṃ cānvaya-vyatirekābhyām
GK16andhvy_u:936_3: avasīyate / yathā hi śakti-rahitena kavinā evaṃ-vidhe viṣaye śṛṅgāra upanibadhyamānaḥ
GK16andhvy_u:937: nanv asmin pakṣe “yo yaḥ śastraṃ bibharti” ity ādau kim acārutvam ?
GK16andhvy_u:938: apratīyamānam evāropayāmaḥ / tasmād guṇa-vyatiriktatve guṇa-rūpatve ca saṅghaṭanāyā anyaḥ kaścin niyama-hetur vaktavya ity ucyate /
GK16andhvy_u:945: kathā-nāyakaś ca dhīrodāttādi-bheda-bhinnaḥ pūrvas tad-anantaro veti vikalpāḥ / vācyaṃ ca dhvany-ātma-rasāṅgaṃ rasābhāsāṅgaṃ vā,
GK16andhvy_u:948: tatra yadā kavir apagata-rasa-bhāvo vaktā tadā racanāyāḥ kāma-cāraḥ / yadāpi kavi-nibaddho vaktā rasa-bhāva-rahitas tadā sa eva;
GK16andhvy_u:949_0: yadā tu kaviḥ kavi-nibaddho vā vaktā rasa-bhāva-samanvito rasaś ca pradhānāśritatvād
GK16andhvy_u:949_1: dhvany-ātma-bhūtas tadā niyamenaiva tatrāsamāsā-madhya-samāse eva saṅghaṭane / karuṇa-vipralambha-śṛṅgārayos
GK16andhvy_u:950_0: katham iti ced ucyate-raso yadā prādhānyena pratipādyas tadā tat-pratītau vyavadhāyakā
GK16andhvy_u:950_1: virodhinaś ca sarvātmanaiva parihāryāḥ / evaṃ ca dīrgha-samāsā saṅghaṭanā samāsānām
GK16andhvy_u:950_2: aneka-prakāra-sambhāvanayā kadācid rasa-pratītiṃ vyavadadhātīti tasyāṃ nātyantam
GK16andhvy_u:951_0: tato 'nyatra ca viśeṣataḥ karuṇa-vipralambha-śṛṅgārayoḥ / tayor hi sukumārataratvāt
GK16andhvy_u:951_1: svalpāyām apy asvacchatāyāṃ śabdārthayoḥ pratītir mantharībhavati / rasāntare punaḥ
GK16andhvy_u:951_2: pratipādye raudrādau madhyama-samāsā saṅghaṭanā kadācid dhīroddhata-nāyaka-sambandha-vyāpāreṇa
GK16andhvy_u:951_3: dīrgha-samāsāpi vā tad-ākṣepāvinābhāvi-rasocita-vācyāpekṣayā na viguṇā bhavatīti
GK16andhvy_u:952_0: sarvāsu ca saṅghaṭanāsu prasādākhyo guṇo vyāpī / sa hi sarva-rasa-sādhāraṇaḥ sarva-saṅghaṭanā-sādhāraṇaś
GK16andhvy_u:952_1: cety uktam / prasādātikrame hy asamāsāpi saṅghaṭanā karuṇa-vipralambha-śṛṅgārau na
GK16andhvy_u:952_2: vyanakti / tad-aparityāge ca madhyama-samāsāpi na na prakāśayati /
GK16andhvy_u:953: tasmāt sarvatra prasādo 'nusartavyaḥ / ata eva ca “yo yaḥ śastraṃ bibharti” ity ādau yady ojasaḥ sthitir neṣyate tat-prasādākhya eva guṇo na mādhuryam / na cācārutvam ;
GK16andhvy_u:954_0: abhipreta-rasa-prakāśanāt / tasmād guṇāvyatiriktatve guṇa-vyatiriktatve vā saṅghaṭanāyā
GK16andhvy_u:954_1: yathoktād aucityād viṣaya-niyamo 'stīti tasyā api rasa-vyañjakatvam / tasyāś ca rasābhivyakti-nimitta-bhūtāyā
GK16andhvy_u:954_2: yo 'yam anantarokto niyama-hetuḥ sa eva guṇānāṃ niyato viṣaya iti guṇāśrayeṇa vyavasthānam apy aviruddham /
GK16andhvy_u:957: viṣayāśrayam apy anyad aucityaṃ tāṃ niyacchati /
GK16andhvy_u:958: kāvya-prabhedāśrayataḥ sthitā bhedavatī hi sā // DhvK_3.7 //
GK16andhvy_u:959: vaktṛ-vācya-gataucitye saty api viṣayāśrayam anyad aucityaṃ saṅghaṭanāṃ niyacchati / yataḥ kāvyasya prabhedā muktakaṃ saṃskṛta-prākṛtāpabhraṃśa-nibaddham,
GK16andhvy_u:961_0: paryāya-bandhaḥ parikathā khaṇḍa-kathā sakala-kathe sarga-bandho 'bhineyārtham ākhyāyikā-kathe
GK16andhvy_u:961_1: ity evam ādayaḥ / tad-āśrayeṇāpi saṅghaṭanā viśeṣavatī bhavati / tatra muktakeṣu
GK16andhvy_u:961_2: rasa-bandhābhiniveśinaḥ kaves tad-āśrayam aucityam / tac ca darśitam eva / anyatra kāma-cāraḥ /
GK16andhvy_u:962_0: muktakeṣu prabandheṣv iva rasa-bandhābhiniveśinaḥ kavayo dṛśyante / yathā hy amarukasya
GK16andhvy_u:962_1: kaver muktakāḥ śṛṅgāra-rasa-syandinaḥ prabandhāyamānāḥ prasiddhā eva / sandānitakādiṣu
GK16andhvy_u:962_2: tu vikaṭa-nibandhanaucityān madhyama-samāsā-dīrgha-samāse eva racane / prabandhāśrayeṣu
GK16andhvy_u:962_4: eva saṅghaṭane / kadācid arthaucityāśrayeṇa dīrgha-samāsāyām api saṅghaṭanāyāṃ paruṣā
GK16andhvy_u:962_5: grāmyā ca vṛttiḥ parihartavyā / parikathāyāṃ kāma-cāraḥ,
GK16andhvy_u:963: tatretivṛtta-mātropanyāsena nātyantaṃ rasa-bandhābhiniveśāt / khaṇḍa-kathā-sakala-kathayos tu prākṛta-prasiddhayoḥ kulakādi-nibandhana-bhūyastvād dīrgha-samāsāyām api na virodhaḥ /
GK16andhvy_u:964_0: vṛtty-aucityaṃ tu yathā-rasam anusartavyam / sarga-bandhe tu rasa-tātparye yathā-rasam
GK16andhvy_u:964_1: aucityam anyathā tu kāma-cāraḥ / dvayor api mārgayoḥ sarga-bandha-vidhāyināṃ darśanād
GK16andhvy_u:964_2: rasa-tātparyaṃ sādhīyaḥ / abhineyārthe tu sarvathā rasa-bandhe 'bhiniveśaḥ kāryaḥ /
GK16andhvy_u:964_3: ākhyāyikā-kathayos tu gadya-nibandhana-bāhulyād gadye ca chando-bandha-bhinna-prasthānatvād
GK16andhvy_u:964_4: iha niyame hetur akṛta-pūrvo 'pi manāk kriyate || DhvA_3.7 ||
GK16andhvy_u:967: etad yathoktam aucityam eva tasyā niyāmakam /
GK16andhvy_u:969_0: yad etad aucityaṃ vaktṛ-vācya-gataṃ saṅghaṭanāyā niyāmakam uktam etad eva gadye chando-niyama-varjite
GK16andhvy_u:969_1: 'pi viṣayāpekṣaṃ niyama-hetuḥ / tathā hy atrāpi yadā kaviḥ kavi-nibaddho vā vaktā
GK16andhvy_u:969_2: rasa-bhāva-rahitas tadā kāma-cāraḥ / rasa-bhāva-samanvite tu vaktari pūrvoktam evānusartavyam /
GK16andhvy_u:969_3: tatrāpi ca viṣayaucityam eva / ākhyāyikāyāṃ tu bhūmnā madhyama-samāsā-dīrgha-samāse
GK16andhvy_u:969_4: eva saṅghaṭane / gadyasya vikaṭa-bandhāśrayeṇa chāyāvattvāt / tatra ca tasya prakṛṣyamāṇatvāt /
GK16andhvy_u:969_5: kathāyāṃ tu vikaṭa-bandha-prācurye 'pi gadyasya rasa-bandhoktam aucityam anusartavyam || DhvA_3.8 ||
GK16andhvy_u:973: racanā viṣayāpekṣaṃ tat tu kiṃcid vibhedavat // DhvK_3.9 //
GK16andhvy_u:974: athavā padyavad gadya-bandhe 'pi rasa-bandhoktam aucityaṃ sarvatra saṃśritā racanā bhavati / tat tu viṣayāpekṣaṃ kiṃcid viśeṣavad bhavati,
GK16andhvy_u:975_0: na tu sarvākāram / tathā hi gadya-bandhe 'py atidīrgha-samāsā racanā na vipralambha-śṛṅgāra-karuṇayor
GK16andhvy_u:975_1: ākhyāyikāyām api śobhate / nāṭakādāv apy asamāsaiva na raudra-vīrādi-varṇane / viṣayāpekṣaṃ
GK16andhvy_u:975_2: tv aucityaṃ pramāṇato 'pakṛṣyate prakṛṣyate ca / tathā hy ākhyāyikāyāṃ nātyantam
GK16andhvy_u:975_3: asamāsā sva-viṣaye 'pi nāṭakādau nātidīrgha-samāsā ceti saṅghaṭanāyā dig-anusartavyā || DhvA_3.9 ||
GK16andhvy_u:976: idānīm alakṣya-krama-vyaṅgyo dhvaniḥ prabandhātmā rāmāyaṇa-mahābhāratādau prakāśamānaḥ prasiddha eva / tasya tu yathā prakāśanaṃ tat pratipādyate-
GK16andhvy_u:989_0: prabandho 'pi rasādīnāṃ vyañjaka ity uktaṃ tasya vyañjakatve nibandhanam / prathamaṃ
GK16andhvy_u:989_2: pratipipādayiṣita-rasa-bhāvādy-apekṣayā ya ucito vibhāvo bhāvo 'nubhāvaḥ sañcārī
GK16andhvy_u:989_3: vā tad-aucitya-cāruṇaḥ kathā-śarīrasya vidhir vyañjakatve nibandhanam ekam / tatra
GK16andhvy_u:989_4: vibhāvaucityaṃ tāvat prasiddham / bhāvaucityaṃ tu prakṛty-aucityāt / prakṛtir hy
GK16andhvy_u:989_5: uttama-madhyamādhama-bhāvena divya-mānuṣādi-bhāvena ca vibhedinī / tāṃ yathāyatham
GK16andhvy_u:989_6: anusṛtyāsaṅkīrṇaḥ sthāyī bhāva upanibadhyamāna aucitya-bhāg bhavati / anyathā tu
GK16andhvy_u:989_7: kevala-mānuṣāśrayeṇa divyasya kevala-divyāśrayeṇa vā kevala-mānuṣasyotsāhādaya upanibadhyamānā
GK16andhvy_u:989_8: anucitā bhavanti / tathā ca kevala-mānuṣasya rājāder varṇane saptārṇava-laṅghanādi-lakṣaṇā
GK16andhvy_u:989_9: vyāpārā upanibadhyamānā sauṣṭhava-bhṛto 'pi nīrasā eva niyamena bhavanti,
GK16andhvy_u:992: tad-aloka-sāmānya-prabhāvātiśaya-varṇane kim anaucityaṃ sarvorvī-bharaṇa-kṣamāṇāṃ kṣamā-bhujām iti / na tad asti ;
GK16andhvy_u:993: na vayaṃ brūmo yat prabhāvātiśaya-varṇanam anucitaṃ rājñām,
GK16andhvy_u:994_0: kiṃ tu kevala-mānuṣāśrayeṇa yotpādya-vastu-kathā kriyate tasyāṃ divyam aucityaṃ na
GK16andhvy_u:994_1: yojanīyam / divya-mānuṣyāyāṃ tu kathāyām ubhayaucitya-yojanam aviruddham eva / yathā
GK16andhvy_u:994_2: pāṇḍv-ādi-kathāyām / sātavāhanādiṣu tu yeṣu yāvad apadānaṃ śrūyate teṣu tāvan-mātram
GK16andhvy_u:994_3: anugamyamānam anuguṇatvena pratibhāsate / vyatiriktaṃ tu teṣām evopanibadhyamānam anucitam /
GK16andhvy_u:998_0: ata eva ca bharate prakhyāta-vastu-viṣayatvaṃ prakhyātodātta-nāyakatvaṃ ca nāṭakasyāvaśya-kartavyatayopanyastam /
GK16andhvy_u:998_1: tena hi nāyakaucityānaucitya-viṣaye kavir na vyāmuhyati / yas tūtpādya-vastu nāṭakādi
GK16andhvy_u:999: nanu yady utsāhādi-bhāva-varṇane kathañcid divya-mānuṣyādy-aucitya-parīkṣā kriyate tat kriyatām,
GK16andhvy_u:1001_0: ratir hi bhāratavarṣocitenaiva vyavahāreṇa divyānām api varṇanīyeti sthitiḥ / naivam /
GK16andhvy_u:1001_1: tatraucityātikrameṇa sutarāṃ doṣaḥ / tathā hy adhama-prakṛtyaucityenottama-prakṛteḥ
GK16andhvy_u:1002: trividhaṃ prakṛty-aucityaṃ bhārate varṣe 'py asti śṛṅgāra-viṣayam /
GK16andhvy_u:1003: yat tu divyam aucityaṃ tat tatrānupakārakam eveti cet-na vayaṃ divyam aucityaṃ śṛṅgāra-viṣayam anyat kiṃcid brūmaḥ / kiṃ tarhi ?
GK16andhvy_u:1004: bhāratavarṣa-viṣaye yathottama-nāyakeṣu rājādiṣu śṛṅgāropanibandhas tathā divyāśrayo 'pi śobhate / na ca rājādiṣu prasiddha-grāmya-śṛṅgāropanibandhanaṃ prasiddhaṃ nāṭakādau,
GK16andhvy_u:1006: nāṭakāder abhineyārthatvād abhinayasya ca sambhoga-śṛṅgāra-viṣayasyāsabhyatvāt tatra parihāra iti cet-na;
GK16andhvy_u:1007: yady abhinayasyaivaṃ-viṣayasyāsabhyatā tat kāvyasyaivaṃ-viṣayasya sā kena nivāryate ?
GK16andhvy_u:1008_0: tasmād abhineyārthe 'nabhineyārthe vā kāvye yad uttama-prakṛte rājāder uttama-prakṛtibhir

GK16andhvy_u:1339_1: dhvanau / tad-ubhayāśrayatva-pratipādanāyaiva ca dhvaneḥ prathamataraṃ dvau prabhedāv
GK16andhvy_u:1339_2: upanyastau / tad ubhayāśritatvāc ca tad-eka-rūpatvaṃ tasya na śakyate vaktum / yasmān
GK16andhvy_u:1340_0: kvacil lakṣaṇāśrayeṇa vṛtteḥ / na ca lakṣaṇaika-rūpam evānyatra vācakatvāśrayeṇa

GK16andhvy_u:1340_2: tathā hi gīta-dhvanīnām api vyañjakatvam asti rasādi-viṣayam / na ca teṣāṃ vācakatvaṃ

GK16andhvy_u:1340_4: ayuktaṃ vaktum / yadi ca vācakatva-lakṣaṇādīnāṃ śabda-prakārāṇāṃ prasiddha-prakāra-vilakṣaṇatve
GK16andhvy_u:1340_5: 'pi vyañjakatvaṃ prakāratvena parikalpyate tac chabdasyaiva prakāratvena kasmān na parikalpyate ?

GK16andhvy_u:1342: tasya cāvivakṣita-vācyo vivakṣitānya-para-vācyaś ceti dvau prabhedāv anukrāntau prathamataraṃ tau savistaraṃ nirṇītau /
GK16andhvy_u:1343_0: anyo brūyāt-nanu vivakṣitānya-para-vācye dhvanau guṇa-vṛttitā nāstīti yad ucyate

GK16andhvy_u:1346_2: ca dṛśyata iti vyañjakatva-vyavahāro yukty-anurodhī / svarūpaṃ prakāśayann eva parāvabhāsako
